Texts.Chs: 一盏灯蛾形状的灯。但这些灯蛾从哪里来？
Texts.Eng: A Lumoth shaped lamp. Where do Lumoth come from anyhow?

Texts.Chs: 模仿灯蛾的灯。所有的魅力和效率，没有任何飘动！
Texts.Eng: A lamp modeled after a Lumoth. All of the charm and efficiency with none of the fluttering!

Texts.Chs: 一个相当聪明的照明方法...而且很可爱。
Texts.Eng: A rather clever idea for lighting... And adorable to boot.

Texts.Chs: 一盏非常可爱的灯。看看那些小翅膀！
Texts.Eng: An absolutely adorable lamp of an absolutely adorable creature. Just look at those little wings!

Texts.Chs: 多可爱啊...不过我想真正的灯蛾也是。
Texts.Eng: How cute... Though I suppose actual Lumoth are as well.

Texts.Chs: 我猜这盏灯的底座是为了防止它飞走？
Texts.Eng: I guess the base of this lamp is to keep it from flying away?

Texts.Chs: 灯蛾是有趣的动物。很遗憾，他们似乎都很敌对。
Texts.Eng: Lumoth are interesting creatures. It's a shame they all seem to be so hostile.

Texts.Chs: 灯蛾灯不是由火驱动的。叶族人可以用它们照亮整个村庄！
Texts.Eng: Lumoth light issn't powered by fire. Floran could use them to light their entire village!
